answers.answer: I joined 16 weeks ago, and I've lost 30+ pounds.The program works if you work the program.  I don't know how long ago you were a member, but its an awesome, healthy way to eat and live.My husband has Type 2 diabetes and hypertension, and he's been able to stop both his meds for these conditions (of course with his doctors approval) with his almost 40 pound loss.If you need help or support, let me know.

question: I am considering going back to Weight Watchers.  I wondered what individuals who have been on the new plan like it.  I am pre-diabetic, have fibromyalgia, and high cholesterol.  My dr is urging me to lose weight and exercises.  I just can't seem to do it on my own anymore.Just looking for a little guidance
title: Weight Watchers and Weight loss
